The role includes project and stakeholder management, prioritization, technology design and implementation, vendor management.Reporting directly to: Head of CRM ANI Vietnam Working location: Melinh Point Tower, 2 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, HCMCCore job responsibilities:  Main responsibilities:  Manage and enhance CRM systems (SFSC, SFMC, API) to best support for CRM operation and reporting. Manage vendors to work on automation solutions from proposing, executing, optimizing to full evaluating performance Working with the IT team and Regional IT to sourcing and implementing the most appropriate solutions for CRM automation Provide strategic recommendations on building online experiences with automation solution for the brands Work with Operations Manager and CRM Analytics Manager to identify key performance metrics to track, required resources and systems integrations required and development of end-to-end project plans. Manage and resolving campaign operational issues in term of system perspective Collaborate with CRM Operation Manager to conduct UAT for all projects which require technical support Managing automation for customer journey on SFMC, working with Brand, CRM Analytics Manager and CRM Operation Manager to provide the best experience for Abbott customers. Work with the Digital, Ecommerce, and Sales Heads to deliver automation solution for omnichannels MINIMUM BACKGROUND/ EXPERIENCE REQUIREDWork Experience:5-8 years’ experience in software development, project management Strong background in automation solution and performance driven Experienced in IT solutions, online sales and Vendor management Relevant business experience required with demonstrated understanding of database and analytics. A Confident and articulate communicator capable of inspiring strong collaboration in an organization, equally confident in presenting to junior executives and senior leaders within the organization Ability to translate the technical term and content to business language and delivery effectively to relevant stakeholders. Excellent problem-solving skills along with the ability to understand and apply analytical judgment Ability to break down complex problems into manageable goals and actions Knowledge of the latest industry technologies, able to review and provide the business with platform recommendations Ability to prioritize tasks based on business impact and manage time appropriately within a fast-paced environment Core Skill Requirement:Technical Skills:  Familiar with system integration and automation solutions. Database querying (e.g., SQL) is required Programming experience is a plus Advanced proficiency with Word, Access, PowerPoint and Excel is essential Familiar with project management tools such as MS Project… Experience with marketing database platforms and campaign management tools required Six Sigma certification a plus but not mandatory Salesforce certification a plus but not mandatory Language Skills:  English proficient Computer Skills:  Able to utilize computer programs such as notes, excel and PowerPoint to compile, build, analyses and consolidate system data Core Trait/Behavior Requirement:  Excellent interpersonal skills Self-starter, aggressive for constant improvements Capable of timely and fast, accurate deliverables Strong at adaptability MINIMUM EDUCATION REQUIRED Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science preferred

96.job_description: No. 25, Riverview 6, Vinhomes Goldern River, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Technopark Tower, Hanoi, Vietnam  Research Scientist in Machine Learning  Machine Learning (ML) group at VinAI is seeking highly qualified people for the position of Vietnam–based Research Scientist in ML. As a member of the team, you will work on some of the most challenging problems, develop novel ML solutions, and collaborate with research scientists, residents and research engineers to integrate your ideas into products.  WHAT YOU’LL DO Conduct cutting-edge research in machine learning and deep learning related to (but not limited to): generative AI (GenAI), representation learning, optimal transport, domain generalization, unsupervised learning, self–supervised learning, weakly–supervised learning, and reinforcement learning. Publish scientific papers in top–tier conferences on ML such as NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, AISTATS. Collaborate with other lab members and visitors to develop solutions for real-world, large-scale problems. WHAT YOU’LL NEED  Required Qualifications: PhD in Computer Science or related technical fields. Experience in Machine Learning, Algorithmic Foundations of Optimization or Machine Intelligence (Artificial Intelligence). Experience in C, C++, Python. Contributions to world–class research, including publishing papers in world–leading ML venues (NeurIPS, ICML, ICRL, AISTATS).  Preferred Qualifications  1. Relevant work experience, including full-time academia/industry experience or as a researcher in a lab 2. Strong publication record, especially on GenAI 3. Ability to design and execute on research agenda 4. Research activities: The machine learning (ML) group is currently focusing on many of the most studied machine learning topics involving Fundamental ML for GenAI, Representation Learning, Optimal Transport, Meta–learning, Domain Adaptation, Domain Generalization, Active Learning, Bayesian Inference as well as their appropriate connections/combinations. Our research activities mainly include:  Investigating novel solutions for a wide variety of the most challenging problems in machine learning. Collaborating with other VinAI teams (e.g., Computer Vision, NLP, Applied) to integrate research ideas into products. Collaborating with world–class researchers from all over the world in doing research on the related topics above Organizing a weekly reading group: To explore, discuss relevant state–of–the–art work. Publishing research papers at top–tier conferences on AI/ML including NeurIPS, ICML, UAI, ICLR, AISTATS, AAAI. WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORK HERE Opportunity to apply your knowledge and research skills to make real impact to the world. Compensation is highly competitive and will consider the applicant’s current experience level Work on challenging real–world problems. Opportunity to continuously grow your knowledge and your leadership skills Opportunity to contribute, interact, share and learn from exceptionally talented colleagues  Join us in cultivating a culture of continuous learning and professional growth at VinAI. Apply now and contribute to our employees’ development journey!  Contact: Interested applicants are invited to send your application to job@vinai.io  Interested applicants are invited to send your application to job@vinai.io

97.job_description: Verticurl Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam Job Posted Date: 08/21/2024  About Verticurl  Verticurl (a division of Ogilvy), is a WPP company, was established in 2006 with the mission to be the world’s leading marketing technology services agency for global organization with a presence in APAC, North America and LATAM. Verticurl global marketing automation, demand generation and digital strategy specialists support our customers in more than 14 different languages and in a variety of industry sectors, including High Tech, Banking, Insurance and Financial Services, Manufacturing, Healthcare and Consumer Electronics. WPP is listed in London stock exchange which has approximately 130,000 employees across more than 130 countries.  Purpose of the Role We are seeking an experienced AI Architect to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in designing and implementing AI solutions, with hands-on experience in deployment and MLOps. Proficiency in Python and a solid understanding of machine learning algorithms is essential. This role involves leading the development of AI projects from conception to deployment, ensuring high-quality standards and aligning with the company's strategic goals.  Key Responsibilities  Design and Implement AI Solutions: Develop comprehensive AI solutions that meet business requirements. This includes selecting appropriate models, designing scalable architectures, and integrating AI capabilities into existing systems. Deployment and MLOps: Lead the deployment of AI models into production environments, ensuring robustness, scalability, and performance. Implement MLOps practices to automate and streamline the machine learning lifecycle, including continuous integration, delivery, and monitoring. Python Development: Utilize Python to develop and optimize AI models. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code. Collaboration and Leadership: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to deliver AI projects. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members. Research and Innovation: Stay abreast of the latest AI trends and technologies. Explore new tools and techniques to improve existing processes and contribute to the company's innovation efforts.  Required Skills  Expertise in AI and Machine Learning: Deep understanding of AI principles, machine learning algorithms, and their real-world application. Proficiency in Python: Strong programming skills in Python, including experience with AI and machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Experience in Deployment and MLOps: Proven track record of deploying AI models into production and implementing MLOps practices. Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to tackle complex problems and develop innovative solutions. Communication and Leadership: Excellent communication skills, with the ability to lead projects and collaborate effectively with diverse teams.  Qualifications  Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field. Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in AI architecture, with hands- on experience in deployment and MLOps. Extensive experience in Python programming. Portfolio: Demonstrated ability to design and implement AI solutions. A portfolio of projects showcasing expertise in AI and machine learning is highly desirable.#LI-DNI  At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve. This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

100.job_description: Make an impact with NTT DATA Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion – it’s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive.Your day at NTT DATA Provide technical pre-sales support in articulating infrastructure design with in-depth product knowledge of at least two technology domains, focusing on computing, storage, EUC, virtualization, and networking. What you'll be doing  Key Responsibilities:  Contributes to the development of solution architectures in specific business, infrastructure or functional areas. Identifies and evaluates alternative architect Principal Responsibilities  Provide technical pre-sales support in articulating infrastructure design with in-depth product knowledge of at least two technology domains, focusing on computing, storage, EUC, virtualization, and networking. Drive solution sales by understanding clients' technical needs and translating them into tailored solutions. Develop and maintain intermediate-level skills in public cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS, and GCP. Demonstrate strong expertise in technologies from Microsoft, VMware, Broadcom, Dell, HPE, IBM, and other relevant vendors. Collaborate with sales teams to develop a well-informed infrastructure approach and monitor its implementation. Regularly assess and optimize infrastructure components, including hardware, software, and virtualized environments. Design and manage on-premises and hybrid infrastructure solutions. Troubleshoot technical issues promptly and effectively. Assist with infrastructure migration and modernization strategies. Identify and recommend the best infrastructure architecture options to align with the company's strategic goals. Translate project-specific requirements into scalable and efficient infrastructure designs. Ensure the security and reliability of the infrastructure environment. Provide training and support to teams interacting with the infrastructure. Monitor infrastructure resource utilization and performance. Work with clients to understand their infrastructure needs and implement solutions accordingly. Conduct migrations and upgrades as needed. Utilize virtualization technologies for effective server management. Experience and Skill Requirement  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in designing, implementing, and managing IT infrastructure solutions, with a focus on computing, storage, EUC, virtualization, and networking. Intermediate-level proficiency in public cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP). Strong expertise in technologies from Microsoft, VMware, Dell, HPE, IBM, and other relevant vendors. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong pre-sales skillsets as a part of sales team in a System Integrator Company. Workplace type:About NTT DATA NTT DATA is a $30+ billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long-term success. We invest over $3.6 billion each year in R&D to help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future. As a Global Top Employer, we have diverse experts in more than 50 countries and a robust partner ecosystem of established and start-up companies. Our services include business and technology consulting, data and artificial intelligence, industry solutions, as well as the development, implementation and management of applications, infrastructure, and connectivity. We are also one of the leading providers of digital and AI infrastructure in the world. NTT DATA is part of NTT Group and headquartered in Tokyo.Equal Opportunity Employer NTT DATA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, colour, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other protected category. Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.

HCM  Lương Thỏa thuận  Công ty Tập đoàn Y khoa Hoàn Mỹ  Phòng ban IT  Loại hình Full time JOB SUMMARY: In this impactful leadership-by-example position with Hoan My Medical Corporation (HMC), you will get an opportunity to be hands on and get into the details of complex healthcare solutions. You will collaborate closely with the Group Board, HMC departments and Hospital Leadership to craft and implement innovative patient centric strategic plans and develop integrated technology roadmaps to advance healthcare in Vietnam. As CIO you will:  Drive performance persevering under pressure, supporting the business areas within remit. Ensure contingency is built into plans to cope with unexpected issues. processes are documented and maintained Ensure succession plans for all HMC IT department members are maintainedBe relational with vendors and develop partnerships  Establish strong vendor governance and compliance Approach supplier as partners so they can better understand Hoan My and contribute more effectively Oversee and contribute to product evaluations, service selections and tender Ministry of Health – MOH) Identify and monitor environmental and industry trends Identify current and emerging technologies and issuesEXPERIENCE & SKILLS REQUIREMENTS:  Required background, soft skill 103.job_description: Job Description  This is a remote position.  Company Description  Upskills provides expert financial software consulting for investment banks and leading financial institutions in Asia Pacific, Middle East and Europe region. With a strong, Front to Back expertise in the cash and derivatives markets, coupled with an in-depth knowledge of financial markets technologies, we provide smart, business-wise, and efficient solutionsWe are seeking an ML Researcher/Applied Scientist to join our Research & Development Team in Paris. Research Scientists at Upskills lead our efforts in developing novel architecture and solutions to feed our AI-based solutions and products and produce research that aims to be published in top AI conferences. Individuals in this role are expected to be experts in areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, computational statistics, and applied mathematics, particularly in areas such as natural language processing/understanding, deep learning, and computer vision.  Key Responsibilities  Lead and manage complex R&D or implementation projects on applied mathematics, computer science and machine learning  Bridge the gap between the research and engineering teams by contributing research that can be applied to Upskills’s products and solutions.  Suggest and engage in team collaborations to meet the Research & Development Dept. goals.  Report and present experimental results and research findings, both internally and externally, verbally and in writing.  Solve technical problems using all necessary tools (code, software, etc). focus on the delivery of a solution, including interfaces, API, etc.  Ensure quality and the frugality of the delivered solution  Upon request, collaborate with other groups’ activities, including but not limited to presenting the company to new prospective clients, participating in calls and meetings, and representing Upskills in conferences/events. Requirements  KEY REQUIREMENTS Master's or PhD or equivalent degree in Computer Science/ Machine Learning, Data Science or a related scientific field.Experience using deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, and/or Jax. Excellent communication skills and collaborative spirit. NICE-TO-HAVE Software engineering experience demonstrated via previous work, contributions to open source, or coding competitions. ML Engineering/MLOps skills Cloud computing platforms: Microsoft Azure, AWS Natural Language Processing , Computer Vision or Graph Neural Network experience.  Benefits  BENEFITSDo something meaningful Working in small, diverse teams where you can make an impact Varied challenges across industries Cooperation across France and Asian offices Skill setMachine Learning, Data Science, Python, Programming, Quantitative Analysis, Cloud Computing, ML Ops I'm interestedJob InformationIndustryTechnology Remote JobWork Experience0-2 years

104.job: Chuyên viên Truyền thông nội bộ & phát triển văn hoá
104.job_description: 1. Insight đối tượng, phân tích tình huống, đề xuất:  Phân tích tình hình hiện tại của văn hóa doanh nghiệp, insight các nhóm đối tượng từ đó đề xuất các chương trình, hoạt động phát triển văn hóa bao gồm truyền thông, sự kiện, đào tạo… nhằm giúp thông tin thông suốt trong nội bộ, gắn kết các thành viên cũng như truyền tải sâu rộng các quy tắc ứng xử, hành vi giá trị cốt lõi, văn hóa làm việc…  2. Lập kế hoạch và triển khai các chương trình truyền thông, sự kiện, hoạt động phát triển văn hóa:  Lập kế hoạch theo tháng/quý (chương trình, ngân sách thực hiện); Lên ý tưởng và lập kế hoạch triển khai chi tiết và thực hiện các chương trình truyền thông, sự kiện, phát triển văn hóa; Sự kiện: Lên ý tưởng kịch bản chương trình, kế hoạch, điều phối các bên và triển khai theo đúng kế hoạch. Kết hợp cùng Designer đề xuất các ấn phẩm quà tặng, decor; Truyền thông, ấn phẩm: Phụ trách phát triển ý tưởng, biên tập, quản lý nội dung các kênh, ấn phẩm nội bộ. Thực hiện nội dung truyền thông với đa dạng hình thức sản phẩm; Đánh giá hiệu quả các hoạt động;  3. Phát triển nguồn lực văn hóa:  Kết nối các bên, các thành viên, tham gia điều phối hoạt động của các hạt nhân văn hóa tại cơ sở theo các chương trình sự kiện của Công ty nhằm gắn kết và phát triển văn hóa;  4. Tham gia triển khai các chương trình đào tạo & phát triển đội ngũ:  Kết hợp cùng L&D thực hiện các chương trình đào tạo, truyền thông nhằm phát triển mạnh mẽ văn hóa học tập và nâng cao chất lượng chuyên môn đội ngũ;  II. YÊU CẦU  Tốt nghiệp các trường Đại học chuyên ngành PR, MKT, Báo chí, Kinh tế,… Có tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm trong truyền thông nội bộ, xây dựng văn hoá doanh nghiệp; Có khả năng quan sát, phân tích, nhìn nhận vấn đề tốt; Tư duy tốt, logic, có nhiều góc nhìn. Luôn mong muốn đổi mới, làm theo những cách thức mới để tối ưu và hiệu quả công việc hơn; Kỹ năng viết tốt, tìm kiếm thông tin tốt, nhanh nhạy trong thông tin, con chữ, sáng tạo trong nội dung; Thích kết nối, nói chuyện với con người, đặc biệt là đối tượng lao động phổ thông (Có thể khai thác, phỏng vấn nhân vật để insight sâu được đối tượng mục tiêu); Đa nhiệm. Biết lập và triển khai kế hoạch, biết kết nối, làm việc với các bên để điều phối công việc theo kế hoạch; Trung thực, chăm chỉ, nhanh nhẹn, cầu tiến, luôn muốn thử thách và phát triển bản thân; Chủ động, xông xáo, quyết liệt, trách nhiệm đến cùng trong công việc; Không ngại đám đông, kỹ năng giao tiếp và trình bày tốt; Tư duy thẩm mỹ tốt, có khả năng chụp, quay đơn giản bằng điện thoại. Biết sử dụng ít nhất 1 phần mềm như PS; AI, Cap Cut, Cyberlink, Premiere là lợi thế.  III. QUYỀN LỢI  Được đảm bảo đầy đủ các chế độ Phúc lợi theo Quy định của Pháp luật hiện hành và của Công ty; Thưởng Tết Nguyên Đán, Tết Dương lịch, ngày Lễ khác và thưởng thành tích nổi bật. Liên tục được đào tạo về kiến thức, kỹ năng liên quan đến các lĩnh vực hoạt động của Công ty; Các hoạt động tập thể, giải trí đa dạng (CLB Bóng đá, game, bi lắc, …); sự kiện team-building hàng năm;  IV. THÔNG TIN KHÁC  Thời gian làm việc: 9h00 – 18h30, thứ Hai – thứ Bảy; Địa điểm làm việc: GHTK Building, số 8 Phạm Hùng, Mễ Trì, Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội & VP GHTK, Pico Plaza Building, số 20 Cộng Hoà, Tân Bình, TP. Hồ Chí Minh Cách thức ứng tuyển: Bạn vui lòng gửi CV về địa chỉ huyennt141@ghtk.co, tiêu đề: IC – Họ và tên.

105.job_description: Business Intelligence ManagerCategory: Commercial Marketing Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, VN  Are you passionate about improving patient lives? Do you want to be part of a patient-centric company that is dedicated to making a difference? Novo Nordisk Vietnam is seeking a Business Intelligence (BI) Manager to join our team. If you are ready for a life-changing career, apply now!About the department Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company with 100 years of innovation in diabetes care. This heritage has given us experience and capabilities that also enable us to help people defeat obesity, haemophilia, growth disorders, rare diseases, and other serious chronic diseases. As part of a globally successful pharmaceutical business, Novo Nordisk Vietnam is a high-growth affiliate with an exciting growth trajectory and pipeline in new products and therapy areas in the coming years. We proudly live our purpose of improving the lives of patients within the therapy areas our products treat and put both patients and people firmly in the centre of everything we do. At Novo Nordisk Vietnam, the Customer Engagement and Business Intelligence team aims to contribute towards the business results while creating values for the patients.The position This position reports directly to the Customer Engagement & Business Intelligence Director. In this role, you will engage in cross-functional collaboration to drive the Corporate & Brand strategy development process, along with other business development initiatives, to maximize commercial effectiveness within the organization. The main scope of accountabilities includes, but is not limited to:  Participating in the strategy development and deployment process involves providing insight and critical input for the development of long-term forecasts (LTF), driving the development of a robust corporate/portfolio strategy document during the annual game plan development process in coordination with relevant parties, and supporting the brand team in the development of the brand plan. Managing affiliate pricing and Pricing 360; serving as the point of contact from the affiliate for all pricing-related decisions and queries, driving pricing decisions for new launches, and conducting periodic pricing reviews for the marketed product. Additionally, managing tender pricing and working closely with the Institution team to secure all relevant pricing approvals, while also driving the Annual Pricing Review process and submitting the relevant business case. Overseeing market research projects and external vendors, providing insights and analysis to the affiliate management team, and driving crucial business decisions. Acting as the primary contact for fulfilling market research needs, organizing various research requirements from initiation to agency shortlisting for different projects. Serving as a liaison between the brand team and selected agencies to ensure the successful delivery of research projects, including questionnaire development, fieldwork monitoring, and final project closure. Also, generating regular reports on key insights. Maximizing Commercial Effectiveness by ensuring the implementation of tools and processes by working with related parties to ensure effective implementation of the Commercial Excellence Framework. Driving tactical and strategic activities through cross-functional collaboration to ensure alignment with the business strategy and optimal resource allocation. Working closely with management during business review meetings and delivering management reports. Developing and organizing the presentation flow in coordination with the management team, and delivering the final presentation for the meeting. Additionally, in charge of delivering various reports to management, managing special projects, and identifying and prioritizing new initiatives to enhance commercial effectiveness within the affiliate. QualificationsBachelor’s degree or higher in Business management, data analytics, data management is required. Minimum of 5-8 years’ experience in business intelligence, data management, market research, operation support, business development or marketing within the pharma industry. Deep knowledge in Business intelligence and management capabilities required to ensure high standards with high skills of SQL, Power-BI, Excel. Strategic and analytical skills and strong in project management. Good communication in English in both written and spoken.  Working at Novo Nordisk We are a proud life-science company, and life is our reason to exist. We’re inspired by life in all its forms and shapes, ups and downs, opportunities. For employees at Novo Nordisk, life means many things – from the building blocks of life that form the basis of ground-breaking scientific research, to our rich personal lives that motivate and energise us to perform our best at work. Ultimately, life is why we’re all here - to ensure that people can live a life of chronic disease.Contact Please send your CV online (click on Apply and follow the instructions).Deadline Until the completion of recruitment. Applications will be screened on an ongoing basis, so you are encouraged to apply as soon as possible.We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.#LI-AMS1

106.job_description: Roche fosters diversity, equity and inclusion, representing the communities we serve. When dealing with healthcare on a global scale, diversity is an essential ingredient to success. We believe that inclusion is key to understanding people’s varied healthcare needs. Together, we embrace individuality and share a passion for exceptional care. Join Roche, where every voice matters.  The Position  We advance science so that we all have more time with the people we love.Your Opportunity  Assist Social Media Assist with Content: Corporate bios, photo captions, project descriptions, press releases and media advisories,… Assist with creative work: Photo, Video and Graphics: Edit and format photos and videos for social media and web, photography and videography,… Assist with Media Relations: Help compile and update media contact lists Assist with PowerPoint presentations/ Report preparation/data for meetings Assist with Employee Engagement activities Assist with Communications Campaign General administrative and communications support as assignedWho you are  Are Ideally, pursuing a Degree or Diploma in Business, Public Relations, Mass Communications, Media Studies, Journalism or any communications-related field. Have Strong command of English language – both written and verbal Are conscientious with strong attention to detail Have ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment Have excellent project management skills Are familiarity with using G-Suite and image editing tools such as Adobe InDesign, Photoshop, Canva,… would be an advantage. Must be computer literate (working knowledge of word processing, PowerPoint, Excel).Who we areAt Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

107.company: Tổ hợp Truyền thông Đất Việt VAC
107.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)  Top 3 Reasons To Join Us The Job Nghiên cứu và áp dụng ứng dụng AI:  Nghiên cứu các giải pháp ứng dụng AI trong hoạt động kinh doanh, sản xuất nội dung và truyền thông quảng cáo. Bao gồm việc phát triển các mô hình machine learning hoặc các hệ thống tự động hóa. Đề xuất áp dụng và tham gia triển khai các dự án công nghệ của Tổ hợp nhằm giải quyết các vấn dề thực tế và nâng cao hiệu suất. Nghiên cứu và phát triển các mô hình dữ liệu và thuật toán tùy chỉnh để áp dụng cho các bộ dữ liệu liên quan đến Computer Vision, AI. Nghiên cứu và đề xuất các ý tưởng giảm thiểu rủi ro, lỗi có thể phát sinh.  Triển khai dự án  Triển khai các mô hình AI vào môi trường thực tế và thực hiện các tinh chỉnh cần thiết để cải thiện hiệu suất. Phân tích và xử lý dữ liệu nhằm phục vụ các mô hình dự án. Nghiên cứu các phương án tối ưu hóa hiệu suất của các mô hình AI, đảm bảo hoạt động hiệu quả và đáp ứng được yêu cầu của người dùng. Tích hợp các giải pháp AI vào các hệ thống hiện tại và kiểm thử.  Tư vấn và hỗ trợ  Cung cấp tư vấn và hỗ trợ kỹ thuật cho các nhóm phát triển khác hoặc khách hàng để đảm bảo rằng các ứng dụng AI được triển khai một cách hiệu quả.  Your Skills and Experience  Tốt nghiệp trình độ Đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành CNTT, Kỹ thuật Phần mềm, Khoa học Máy tính hoặc chuyên môn liên quan. Tối thiểu 7 năm kinh nghiệm ở các vị trí AI Engineer, ML Engineer hoặc có liên quan. Có kiến thức tốt về khoa học máy tính, cấu trúc dữ liệu và giải thuật Có kinh nghiệm trong việc thiết kế, huấn luyện, và triển khai các mô hình học máy vào ứng dụng thực tế. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực ứng dụng giải trí, OTT,... Có kinh nghiệm phát triển các sản phẩm liên quan đến streaming video một lợi thế. Hiểu biết sâu về các thuật toán học máy, deep learning, học củng cố (reinforcement learning), và các kỹ thuật khác trong trí tuệ nhân tạo. Thành thạo với Tensorflow, Caffe, Keras, PyTorch, CV và thư viện NLP như OpenCV và spaCy. Có kinh nghiệm về CUDA và GPU Programming. Có kinh nghiệm về hạ tầng Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud Platform.  Why You'll Love Working Here  Tham gia phát triển siêu ứng dụng giải trí VieOn. Nhiều cơ hội phát triển chuyên môn, cập nhật, áp dụng công nghệ mới. Chính sách lương thưởng cạnh tranh, chế độ phúc lợi, đãi ngộ tốt. Môi trường làm việc giàu sức sáng tạo, năng động. Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:Tham gia phát triển siêu ứng dụng giải trí VieOn. Nhiều cơ hội phát triển chuyên môn, cập nhật, áp dụng công nghệ mới. Chính sách lương thưởng cạnh tranh, chế độ phúc lợi, đãi ngộ tốt. Môi trường làm việc giàu sức sáng tạo, năng động. Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học  Yêu cầu công việc: Software Architect, Database Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: CNTT - Phần Cứng,Phần Cứng Máy Tính/Điện Thoại,Điện/Điện tửĐại Học  3 - 7 năm

108.job_description: Shoefabrik46 Trung Son, Binh Chanh, Ho Chi Minh  At office Posted 13 days agoSkills: Business Analyst English ERP Job descriptionArea Of Responsibilities  Provide first line support to the business during the day-to-day running of systems within area of responsibility (initially PLM, SharePoint and MS Teams. This will change over time) Supporting the implementation of changes to these systems. Preparing (including related document set-up), planning and delivery of training for business users and on-going user care. Supporting design and set-up of suitable master data checking routines. Application and document lifecycle governance and maintenance. Carrying out master data checking and managing data cleaning procedures with related staff. Ensuring procedures related to identification, changes, testing, documentation, approval, and communication of any modification to the system are followed. Support the senior team with regards to any ad-hoc department activities Carry out all administration tasks in a professional and timely manner.Your skills and experienceQualification / Education  University degree preferably in Computer Science, MIS, Engineering, Apparel/ Footwear/ Textile Engineering, Business Administration or similar.  Specific Knowledge and Skills  Demonstrate an understanding of digital business processes. Good knowledge of Microsoft Office, including Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, SharePoint, PowerApps, Power Automate, and Teams. Understanding of the application and document lifecycle. Able to learn, develop and implement new processes and procedures efficiently. A good team contributor, working with other staff members to set up people and projects for success. Pro-active in approach and keen to suggest new and innovative solutions. A continuous improvement mind-set that spans people, processes, technologies, and own self. Well organized and able to prioritize, communicate and manage expectations. Able to deliver quality work and to commit to and meet deadlines. Good communication skills in English, both oral and written. Strong and confident customer facing / consulting skills. Attention to detail, service minded, creative and able to work under pressure. High level of integrity and confidentiality. Able to demonstrate energy, drive, enthusiasm, determination, and passion.  Experience  Minimum of 2 years of experience with involvement in real-world system like PLM, ERP, PDM and enterprise system integration deployments in domain. Experience in the Footwear or Apparel industry is an advantage. Experience with a PLM system is an advantage.Why you'll love working hereWhy you'll love working here ➢ Office address: No. 46-64, Street 8, Trung Son Residential Area, Binh Hung Commune, Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City. ➢ Working hours: 5 days/week (Monday - Friday, 8:15 - 17:00). ➢ Private health insurance, Annual health checkup. ➢ Full of social welfare under Vietnamese Labor Law. ➢ Multinational working environment professional & friendly colleagues. ➢ Women’s Day, Children’s Day, Mid-Autumn Festival and other benefits under the provisions of the company. ➢ Training opportunities ➢ Company leave & holidays: 20-25 days/year. ➢ Vehicle gives delivery date (if necessary). ➢ Salary negotiable according to experience and ability. ➢ If you are interested, please send your CV in English. 109.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)Tiếp nhận yêu cầu, thu thập thông tin, phân tích và làm rõ các yêu cầu hệ thống. Tham gia vào các cuộc họp với khách hàng, trình bày, demovà đề xuất giải pháp về hệ thống, ứng dụng (web/app). Chuẩn bị các bản đề xuất kỹ thuật, hỗ trợ kỹ thuật cho dự án và khách hàng. Tích cực xây dựng mối quan hệ chặt chẽ với đối tác, khách hàng, và phát triển kinh doanh cho sản phẩm phần mềm. Viết tài liệu đặc tả yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và quy trình nghiệp vụ (workflow), luồng dữ liệu. Trực quan hóa các chức năng bằng sơ đồ (use case, customer/user experience mapping). Thiết kế giao diện mẫu (prototype/mockup/wireframes), phối hợp Designer xây dựng UI/UX. Phối hợp chặt chẽ với bộ phận liên quan (PM, Designer, Dev team) trong quá trình phát triển sản phẩm để đảm bảo các thành viên dự án hiểu rõ và hiểu đúng yêu cầu của khách hàng. Tham gia kiểm thử chất lượng phần mềm và viết tài liệu hướng dẫn, đào tạo và hỗ trợ người dùng sử dụng sản phẩm, xử lý sự cố khi vấn đề xảy ra. Thực hiện các công việc khác được phân công bởi quản lí trực tiếp.Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Mức lương hấp dẫn, phù hợp với năng lực cá nhân. Review lương: 1 năm 1 lần. Cơ hội tham gia phân tích, tư vấn và phát triển các giải pháp ứng dụng cho nhiều dự án lớn, thương hiệu lớn ở Việt Nam & nước ngoài. Làm việc trên nền tảng công nghệ mới nhất. Cơ hội phát triển kỹ năng cứng và mềm thông qua các dự án và được đào tạo chuyên môn. Nghỉ phép hàng năm, điều kiện làm việc theo luật lao động Việt Nam. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm. Tham gia team building, du lịch hàng năm. Tham gia đầy đủ BHYT, BHXH, Bảo hiểm Bảo Việt. Chính sách chăm sóc sức khoẻ cho gia đình CBNV.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Khoa học máy tính, Công nghệ thông tin,Phát triển hệ thống hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan. Tối thiểu 6 tháng đến 1 năm ở vị trí Business Analyst hoặc tương đương. Hiểu biết use case, biết vẽ sơ đồ workflow, vẽ wireframe/mockup screen. Có kiến thức về lập kế hoạch và kỹ năng phân phối, kinh nghiệm quản lý dự án. Sử dụng thành thạo Tiếng Anh (cả viết và nói), MS Office (Word, Excel, Project, PPT). Có thể sử dụng ít nhất một công cụ tạo mẫu (MS Visio, Adobe XD, Figma, BPMN ...), biết về UX/UI là một điểm cộng. Có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực Media, Marketing, AI, Blockchain là 1 lợi thế. Ngoại hình ưa nhìn, kỹ năng trình bày, kỹ năng giao tiếp nội bộ và bên ngoài tốt. Kỹ năng phân tích yêu cầu và giải quyết vấn đề với sự chú ý cao đến từng chi tiết. Tư duy logic, tinh thần trách nhiệm cao và chủ động trong công việc. Sẵn sàng học hỏi, thích ứng nhanh với những điều mới.Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: CNTT - Phần Mềm,Data Analytics,Thiết Kế,UI/UXTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

110.job_description: Job Description Summary Join our dynamic team as a Product Manager for our Medication Delivery Solutions (MDS) portfolio, responsible for driving sustainable growth and implementing innovative marketing strategies across Vietnam. This role offers a unique opportunity to shape country business strategies while collaborating closely with internal and regional partners. This is a full-time position, and you will be traveling approximately 30-50% of the time to meet with Key Opinion Leaders. This position bases in Ho Chi Minh office. Job Description  1. Key Responsibilities  Implement marketing activities to drive product adoption and market share growth for the MDS product portfolio in Vietnam, including: Market research: to identify customer needs, market trends, competitive landscape and track post events/activities metrics. Product development and launch activities, ensuring timely delivery and successful market introduction. Pricing execution per product per country. Marketing communications – advertising, promotions, digital marketing. Event organizing: ensure thorough planning, execution and fulfill relevant process required by compliance, monitor and report the execution and effectiveness of marketing plans/budgets via tracking and analyzing post event metrics Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product requirements and specifications. Provide training and support to sales teams and customers on product features, benefits, and usage. Build and maintain strong relationships with key opinion leaders, healthcare professionals, and industry associations. Stay up-to-date with industry advancements, regulations, and standard processes to ensure compliance and competitive advantage. Implements, and maintains "best practices" in brand marketing and product development marketing, this includes use of BD Way of Marketing and leveraging the BD Way of Selling. Assist in monitoring business performance and important metrics and process: demand, forecast accuracy and colaborate with commercial excellent, supply chain, sales team to ensure business goals deliverables.2. Educational Qualifications & Previous Experience  Bachelor’s degree in Science (health care related) or Business. Minimum of 5 years of experience in healthcare with a minimum of 3 years in Product management/Marketing management role. Prior clinical experience in nursing is desired. Understanding of healthcare systems, influencing dynamics and data related to consumables in different care settings in hospital.3. Professional Skills & Key Competencies  Experience in medical device - consumable management is required. Experience in managing cross function activities/ projects, developing and implementing marketing activities. Ability to plan ahead / envision and ensure timely execution. Leadership ability to influence without authority, develop and empower associates to achieve objectives with a team approach including careful delegation of tasks while maintaining responsibility for the final result. Strong event management, customer focus, relationship management skills at senior levels, market intelligence with advanced research and analytical problem solving skills. Excellent skills in written, verbal communication in English and presentation in both Vietnamese and English. BD is a medical technology company that serves healthcare institutions, life science researchers, clinical laboratories, industry and the general public. BD manufactures and sells a broad range of medical supplies, devices, laboratory equipment and diagnostic products. BD is headquartered in the United States and has offices in more than 50 countries worldwide. Learn about BD at www.bd.comDisclaimer: The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified. All associates may be required to perform duties outside of their normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed.Primary Work Location VNM Ho Chi Minh City - Me Linh Point Tower Additional LocationsWork Shift

Hiểu biết về AWS Cloud là một lợi thế. Giờ làm việc: 9am - 6pm | From Monday - Friday Địa điểm: 100% Remote , thi thoảng sẽ cần lên office tại quận 2  Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Lương từ 12tr - 45tr net hoặc đàm phán (Junior -Senior) Nghỉ lễ + phép năm Các phúc lợi theo quy định công ty (nếu có)  Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Cao Đẳng  Yêu cầu công việc:  Kinh nghiệm làm việc với JavaScript và Python. Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt và khả năng giải quyết về AWS Cloud Am hiểu và có kinh nghiệm áp dụng các design pattern, design principles, system design trong phát triển phần mềm. 112.job_description: Help achieve our purpose: Feeding the FutureNutreco is a pioneer in animal nutrition and aquafeed – and our purpose of Feeding the Future is our passion. Through it, we’re shaping a sustainable future for food production globally. As part of the SHV family, our business lines, Skretting and Trouw Nutrition, are revolutionizing aquaculture and advancing livestock health and productivity with innovative solutions that are breaking new ground in the industry. There’s no better place to kickstart your career!The opportunity Drive your future success in end-to-end supply chain by learning from some of the industry’s foremost experts in sustainability, procurement, quality, manufacturing, logistics, planning and engineering. Work at the Centre of it all and build your international acumen by connecting with our Business Units and Global Supply Chain Leadership Team – the central interface between production, R&D, sales and our customers. Gain practical experience in supply chain excellence by working on challenging tasks, projects and completing numerous trainings in an international environment.Young Professional Program description We offer a special 18-month program, split into three six-month rotations on the job, normally in three different countries, in three different supply chain areas. The program is designed to help you fully develop yourself on a personal and professional level by understanding our end-to-end supply chain processes, including the interdependencies and interconnectedness between different areas. You will gain industry-specific knowledge and leverage the experience of experts in our different locations and Opcos.Who we’re looking for:Academic achievement: Strong technical academic background; Master’s in for example Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Operations Management, Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, Data Analytics or Business Administration.Language: Strong proficiency of business English and local language  Professional experience and passion: Maximum of one to two years of experience in supply chain, business administration or manufacturing environments.Global mobility and adaptability: Eagerness to take on global projects and temporary international relocation opportunities. Flexibility and ability to adapt to different cultures, helping our operations around the world.Proactive learners: Enjoyment in mastering complex concepts and applying learnings in practical ways to make an impact.  Creative problem solvers: Ability to approach challenges creatively, thinking outside the box to find the best solutions.Diversity & inclusion: Appreciation and respect for diverse perspectives and ability to share your own ideas and work inclusively.Collaboration: Strong sense of teamwork. Appreciation for diverse perspectives and working synergistically to achieve collective goals.  Entrepreneurial mindset: Proactive, enterprising spirit that seeks new opportunities for improvement and innovation within the supply chain arena.Why Nutreco? By choosing Nutreco, you’ll help us lead the change towards global sustainable food production, equipped with the best training and mentorship and a spirit of innovation. This program isn’t just about what you can bring to us, but how we can grow together, fostering a culture that sparks entrepreneurial mindset.Local hiring company - home location  You will spend the first six months at your home location (Vietnam) gaining on-the-job experience with a real-life job, learning about key supply chain processes, systems, respective goods and services and dataflows. In parallel, you will also start to develop your personal network in a collaborative environment.Plant and Opco locations After the first six months working from your home location, you will spend several months in some of our international plants and locations. The focus here will be on gaining additional perspectives and learning about the day-to-day operational and strategic challenges. At this point, you may identify potential improvements to help us along in our continuous drive for optimization.YPP Academy Weeks Each rotation starts with a Skills Development Academy week focused on job-specific learning and personal development. You will also meet your fellow global Young Professionals and benefit from a wide range of trainings and events. During all the phases of your traineeship, you will work as part of the Supply Chain team on a challenging position, global project, operational business tasks and attend several training courses. This combination of on-the-job, projects, training and international experience will provide you with excellent skills and give you a solid head start on your career.Step into your futureRecruitment process Submit your application. Interview: Connect with your potential future manager to discuss your aspirations and potential fit. Assessment: Review your values alignment, personality, and ability with Nutreco’s needs. Offer: Join us in Feeding the Future!  For application details and more, visit the Nutreco career site. And be quick – the journey begins soon, and we’re eager to welcome our new cohort of visionaries.  To be eligible, candidates must have completed their Master’s program before the traineeship 1st of October 2024, be willing to undertake regional/international assignments; embody the qualities of collaboration and have an entrepreneurial spirit.

113.job_description: Hasaki29 Hoang Viet St., Ward 4, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh  At office Posted 23 days agoSkills: Business Analyst Project Manager Top 3 reasons to join us  Bonus on each project Bonus on each project Lunch providing  Job description  Research and coordinate with departments to design and develop documents describing the company's products; Propose improvements to the company's technology products; Create and manage document systems (such as system requirement specification, feature list, use case list, use case detail, general business rules, wireframe...); Create mock-ups for products, act as a bridge between the development department and the operations department; Able to support on testing of applications as a tester; Other tasks as assigned by direct manager;  Your skills and experience  Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Science, Business, Economics; 2 - 3 years of experience working as the same role; Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities; Have a background in information technology and software development; Have knowledge and skills in testing software products; Have basic knowledge of data and data query; Have a professional BA certificate;  Why you'll love working here  Salary range: up to 25m gross; 13th- month salary, annual performance review; Fully insurance will be paid in gross salary after probation; Provide working devices, parking fee allowance (if any); Hasaki  Công ty CP Hasaki Beauty & ClinicCompany type Non-ITCompany industry  Retail and Wholesale Company size 1000+ employeesCountryVietnam  Working days Monday - FridayOvertime policy No OT

114.job_description: Do you want to challenge yourself in handling multiple projects under AWS, Azure, and GCP?We’re looking for an outstanding Full-Stack DevOps Engineer who are technical competitor in relevant IT fields, a developer, a strategic planner, and a visionary.In this multifaceted role, you will be a major player in our technology team, responsible for ensuring our tech infrastructure's reliability, scalability, and innovation. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver robust, scalable, high-performance software solutions. Job description  Collaborate closely with Product and Development teams to ideate scalable software solutions and ensure Product vision is executed. Identify technologies that can improve the company’s products and services. Oversee our overall technology development and utilization plan and manage all of our company's technology resources. Build and maintain Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to automate software deployments, testing, and monitoring. Manage cloud services on platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP, optimizing resources for cost-effectiveness. Implement backup and disaster recovery plans to ensure data and service availability. Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities. Understand what is going on in the field when the customer uses the software. Have a good grasp of the business. Communicate effectively on Handprint’s technology status, goals, and/or progress to stakeholders. After Series A: build, lead, and train a strong team to deliver the roadmap and achieve business goals. Job requirements Be dreaming! If you have not yet matched all of our requirements but found those would be your capacities inthe future, don’t hesitate to apply.  Even as a junior, if you have a dream and find that you have the ability to build yourself up to be a DevOps like in our expectation, don’t hesitate to apply.Must have  Proficiency in English in all 4 skills. Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer for a software development company/established start-up that has achieved scale. Extensive experience in coding, system architecture, solution design, leading technical research, and technical strategy. Excellent knowledge of microservice architecture & database architecture and optimization. Knowledge of information system security. Knowledge of web application architecture and RESTful API design principles. Proficiency in working with a few of those programming languages JavaScript, NodeJS, Python, Ruby, Java, or .NET. Knowledge of technology in all areas: systems development/architecture, security, databases, and overseeing, managing, and bringing together all technology areas. 117.job_description: Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam Posted on 2023-11-27 16:04:19 · 7 applicants  Negotiable  Full-time  DirectorKey Responsibilities:Technology Vision  You’ll establish the company’s technical vision and lead all aspects of the company’s technological development. You’ll architect the entire technical strategy for Hello Health. You’ll direct the company’s strategic direction, development and future growth. You’ll conduct research and case studies on leading edge technologies and make determinations on the probability of implementation. You’ll act as a good steward of Hello Health Group resources and ensure control of Technology departmental budgets. You’ll supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency You’ll act as a mentor to the technology team members You’ll show hands on approach to solve problems  Design and Development/Strategy  The VP of Tech plays a leadership role in the engineering department where he/she seeks excellence in all engineering disciplines inclusive of data processing, quality assurance, application development, analytics, machine learning, algorithms, and data warehousing. In this position, the VP of Tech manages the day-to-day activities of the engineering teams as well as the management and execution of site/software development projects against delivery commitments and project plans. You’re also in charge of the management of the department’s staffing, resources, and mentoring, and maintaining a best-in-class engineering department. The VP of Tech leads the engineering team in the delivery of platform functionality through a mix of development software and helps the team in achieving and surpassing departmental goals. He/she provides technical guidance and direction, as well as hands-on resource and project management, for all site/software development activities. He/she takes the lead with a profound understanding of new and relevant technologies for the purpose of realizing efficiency. He/she ensures the optimal application of engineering resources in order to meet product development and consumer requirements and ensures the implementation of agile processes that support site/software development processes. The VP of Tech plays a leading role in the recruiting activities of the engineering department in order to ensure consistency in departmental efficiency. You’ll also play a mentorship role to key engineering personnel, assisting in their duties upon request, and constantly promoting the growth of their professional skills, readying them for the assumption of his/her duties in his absence or retirement. The VP of Tech also plays a leading engineering role within the department where he/she is tasked with the planning, management, execution and implementation of site/software projects, inclusive of the day-to-day project management, scope management, issue and risk management, as well as regular status reporting In this capacity, the VP of Tech develops strategic plans with regard to the technical development of sites/software and establishes the business’s technical vision that guides all aspects of technological development. He/she also oversees the strategic deployment of the departmental resources leading to optimal resource allocation and the smooth and successful development of sites/software. The VP of Tech , in this capacity is responsible for the overall system development life-cycle.  Collaboration/Support  The role of the VP of Tech is also a highly collaborative one. The VP of Tech will work closely with senior engineering teams in the management and development of strategic planning. He/she will also work closely with the user experience department in designing, developing, and deploying scalable technologies that will lead to increased consumer satisfaction. The VP of Tech also works with senior engineering management in ensuring that systems meet the overall business requirements and standards.  People and Performance Management  Acts as a good steward of Hello Health Group resources and ensures control of Technology departmental budgets. You ensure the Hello Health Group Core Values, our Purpose and Mission are exemplified in your own behavior and brought to life by your team. You fully commit to and implement Performance Management in line with company policy, engaging and leading individuals and the team effectively to meet company goals. You ensure that all team members have updated Job Descriptions, MBOs and are fully aware of the expectations of their role and responsibilities. You hold regular performance 1 on 1 reviews with direct reports to ensure high levels of staff engagement and delivery on KPIs. You actively identify and address the development needs of your team, utilize the learning opportunities available to them, ensuring your team maximize their own learning by making use of HHG’s offerings such as the HHG Academy. You partner with the HR team to ensure that company policies are implemented and that all employment contracts and practices are compliant with local labor laws. You attract, recruit, retain and develop staff to position Hello Health as an employer of choice in your country.Who We Want: Proven experience as a Tech Lead/Head of Engineering/VP of Tech /VP of Technology or similar leadership role. Knowledge of technological trends to build a strategy. Understanding of budgets and business-planning. Ability to conduct technological analyses and research. Advanced English language is mandatory. Leadership and organizational abilities. Strategic thinking. Problem-solving attitude. BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field. Backend development: PHP, Laravel Framework 5.3+, Golang. Frontend development: React JS + Next.js, HTML, CSS (bootstrap). Database: SQL and relational database management, specifically MySQL, NOSQL like MongoDB. Knowledge about Unix, Linux server, Nginx , Apach. Frameworks and Architecture: CI, Yii, Lumen, Laravel, WordPress, Strapi, Express, Koa, VueJs + Nuxt, React + Next, Gastby, MVC, SOA, Microservice, CI/CD with Jenkins and AWS, Elastic search. Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Kubernete.  What Hello Health Group Offers:We are passionate individuals that are driven to succeed. Our work culture is characterized by strong team spirit, high degrees of openness and innovation, and strong collaboration across fields. We love the freedom of an entrepreneurial company and are looking for like-minded, ambitious professionals who have a desire to build something new and actively support our young company in its growth to greatness. You will love working here!  Competitive salary package Professional and open working environment–culturally integrating the best of Western and Southeast Asian cultures to take the best of each and ensure we build an energetic, commercial, and fun working atmosphere. Opportunities to improve English skills within an international team–English is the official language in all Hello Health offices.  Do you think you’ve got what it takes? !

128.job_description: Roche fosters diversity, equity and inclusion, representing the communities we serve. When dealing with healthcare on a global scale, diversity is an essential ingredient to success. We believe that inclusion is key to understanding people’s varied healthcare needs. Together, we embrace individuality and share a passion for exceptional care. Join Roche, where every voice matters.  The Position  We advance science so that we all have more time with the people we love.The PositionAs the Demand Planner, you will play a crucial role in optimizing Roche Vietnam's supply chain efficiency by accurately forecasting demand, ensuring inventory levels meet customer demands, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. You must have a proven track record of successful demand planning, strong analytical skills, and ability to contribute to the development and implementation of demand planning strategies.Your Opportunities Develop and maintain comprehensive demand forecasts through analysis of historical data, market trends, and inputs from Sales, Marketing, other relevant departments, distributors and customers as the need arises. Closely collaborate with sales and marketing teams to gather market intelligence, customer insights, promotional plans, product launches, new instrument installations, new and renewing tenders that impact demand. Be responsible of forecast accuracy monitoring, figure out the root cause of low forecast accuracy and provide the solution and to optimize inventory levels to meet customer demand while minimizing excess and obsolete inventory. Work closely with Global Product Managers and other internal stakeholders (i.e. Import/Export function) to ensure timely and accurate delivery of products and with global product/ demand planners on stock allocations to ensure sufficient local supply and to identify potential bottlenecks to minimize the negative impact in the market Keep close communication with global and local cross-functional teams and be responsible for stock replenishment planning, setting of safety stocks to ensure the products availability at all the hubs to meet the customers demand and work closely with the local product managers for stock allocations for bottleneck management to ensure sufficient product availability for customers and for effective managing of near-expiry stocks to minimize write-offs Engage with sales, marketing, and other relevant departments to gather information and align on demand planning strategies and proactively address supply chain disruptions to minimize impact on product availability and also provide consulting for demand planning insights to the internal/ external stakeholders in accordance with business needs You will collaborate with the Sales and Marketing teams to understand and incorporate distributor and customer forecasts, promotions, and market trends into demand plans. You will connect directly with distributors and with select customers as may be needed to validate input data. Utilize advanced analytics and statistical models to analyze data, identify trends, and generate insights to improve demand planning accuracy and prepare and distribute regular reports on key performance indicators, demand forecasts, and inventory levels to management. You will assess and mitigate risks, identify opportunities for improvement to stakeholders. Drive enhancement of demand planning accuracy and efficiency to improve the relevant Inventory KPIs and OTIF and proactively identify opportunities for process improvement within the demand planning function. Connect proactively with other Roche affiliates, Regional and Global Supply Chain networks to identify best practices and drive its local implementation to enhance forecasting accuracy and overall supply chain efficiency.Who You Are Have a Bachelor's Degree in Business, Supply Chain Management or related field from a reputable University (local/overseas) Have proven minimum 5 years of experience in demand planning in MNCs preferably from the Healthcare industry Have excellent customer service orientation, communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills Are proficient or hands-on experience in demand planning software and SAP (MM and SD modules) and strong analytical skills with expertise in data analysis and statistical modeling. Have fluent communication in English and VietnameseWho we areAt Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

129.job_description: Giới thiệu: We are a product startup in Silicon Valley looking for exceptional full-stack developers in Vietnam, who will own/build/deploy our AI-based product. You will be working and mentored by successful startup founders, who have built and sold companies in Silicon Valley and have experience working in top technology companies such as Amazon and Facebook. You will own the critical product features that have direct customer impacts. This position is NOT for someone who is looking for a steady and well-defined job but for someone who has an entrepreneurial mentality, who can embrace changes, fast execution speed, and are eager to learn/explore advanced technologies.  Job requirements More than 5 years of experience in the industry. Strong experience in building AI products serving real customers (e.g. data processing, finetuning models, building chatbot). Very good at English (verbal and written) Experience with AI Stack: Python/LLM (OpenAI, Claude)/Lang Chain/Jupyter Notebook. Preferences You are young and hungry. You love building kick-ass products so much that sometimes you forget that you are living on earth. You are willing to work really really hard regardless of time and get great reward for doing so. You have built and deployed 1 or 2 serious AI products. You have an entrepreneurial mentality. Always want to learn new things and explore new technology frontiers. Your friends found you boring because you are always talking about coding. You admit your mistakes and learn fast to not repeat the same ones. Benefits Stock options Work computer and equipments On-site business trips to company HQ in the US Health Insurance Unlimited time off Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 30000K - 40000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Chăm Sóc Sức Khỏe, Cơ Hội Thăng Tiến Hạn nộp: 2024-09-18 Kinh nghiệm: 5 - 6 năm Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: IT/CNTT -IT Phần mềm Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

135.job_description: About FWD Group FWD Group is a pan-Asian life insurance business with more than 13 million customers across 10 markets, including some of the fastest-growing insurance markets in the world. The company was established in 2013 and is focused on changing the way people feel about insurance. FWD’s customer-led and digitally enabled approach aims to deliver innovative propositions, easy-to-understand products and a simpler insurance experience. For more information, please visit  www.fwd.comFWD Vietnam Technology Company Limited., known as FWD VTC, was set up in 2024 and is part of FWD Group. FWD VTC in Vietnam is one of FWD Group’s office locations serving multiple markets within the Group and employs team members in various functions including Group Technology and Operations, Group Digital & Data and our Centre of Excellence comprising cloud & infrastructure, information security, enterprise architecture and solution delivery. PURPOSE  Become a domain area expert in mobile apps/web application for FWD Manage cross functional stakeholders across FWD Countries and Group C-Suite Executives Influence decision making while building the products, apps, and solutions, lead external development, operations, and product teams, and ensure effective project execution across-FWD functions in Group and Countries Lead the Agile development process and reach the business goal Engage in project planning, such as budget, human and computing resource allocations Understand the edging technologies and provide a substainable solution Promote team's morale and supervise the team to reach business goals Discuss with users and provide project timeline , milestones and regular update to the senior management Collect and analyze user requirements, conduct impact analysis and implement the system design Deliver quality solution and strive for better way to implement in terms of code efficiency and reusbility Organize and review technical documentations, such as functional specification, technical specification, ER diagram, data flow and network diagram Manage and provide ongoing BAU support for existing systems Implements computer system requirements by defining and analyzing system problems Organize a code review session and decide a set of automated test cases Ensure applications in both desktop and mobile are compatible across different major browsers Provide suggestions on UX/UI design of the systems layout Design, develop, test, and deploy next-generation mobile native apps, clients and services Work closely with product owner and UX/UI designer to build features that delight our customers  KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES Responsible for managing cross regional IT projects throughout its development life cycle, including resources planning, customers’ expectation management, change management and risk assessment. Review current technology and drive ways to leverage and improve productivity Lead the technical development team, selecting right technology solutions for building the regional end-to-end sales platform. Work closely with product manager and project team members for delivering quality projects and services. Manage project execution, communicate project progress and issues to project stakeholders, including analytical reports, presentations and other documentations as necessary throughout the project delivery process. Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. Maintain and measure the quality of project deliverables within defined and agreed project requirements. Deliver the solution using CI/CD pipeline Deliver solutions that will be used across multiple platforms and languages Make data driven decisions Knowledge transfer on product development and architectural design guidance to local development and application teams and provide guidance across teams Organize Agile ceremonies Set up the process and produce timely regular reports to senior managementsQUALIFICATIONS / EXPERIENCE University degree in Computer Science or equivalent At least 7 years’ experience in IT industry with at least 2 years supervisory/ managerial experience with regional exposure on managing IT programs/projects across different countries Strong insurance knowledge, problem solving and analytical skills Critical thinking and able to drive changes Strong leadership experience. Proven track records in managing regional-based Front-end systems, preferably experiences in implementing IT systems/projects to support Asian countries. Experience with cloud technologies Experience delivering multi-lingual/internationalized solutions Experience leading product development teamsKNOWLEDGE & TECHNICAL SKILLS Proficient in Java Spring Boot, Node JS and React JS / React Native Experience in Mobile App (Android and iOS) and Web development/e-Commerce Experiece on NOSQL database and synchronization is a plus (MongoDB, RealmDB) Good knowledge in container deployment, Kubernetes system, API Gateway, Client/Server, MVC , OOP, RDBMS, automated test and Internet/Intranet environment Proficient in Agile development approach Experience on Insurance Sales Tools development (FNA, RPQ, Sales Illustration, eApplicaition) and integration with other frontend systems Experience on Insurance Products Exemplify good interpersonal communication skills at all levels of business users, IT, partners and vendors Good command in both written & spoken English Broad understanding of the technology industry, including current and emerging digital solutions Deep appreciation of latest and emerging technologies and practice, such as DevOps, Cloud, Microservice and Mobile development Expertise in building secure, scalable RESTFul web services Experience with agile development methodologies and CI/CD
