166.job_description: We are seeking an experienced Automation Test QC Lead to lead our automation testing efforts, ensuring high-quality software products through the development and implementation of comprehensive automated testing strategies. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in automation testing, experience with various tools and technologies, and excellent leadership and communication skills..  How You Can ContributeDefine and Implement Automation Tools: Identify and recommend the set of tools for automation tests, including:Web UI testing tools (e.g., Selenium WebDriver) Mobile testing tools (e.g., Appium, Espresso) API testing tools (e.g., Postman, Rest Assured) Services testing tools (e.g., SoapUI, JMeter) LowCode/NoCode automation testing tool (Mendix) Establish Process and Governance: Develop and implement a comprehensive process for automating tests, including:Test data management Test execution and reporting Defect tracking and resolution, including performances regression Create Reports and Dashboards: Design and develop reports and dashboards to track automation test results, highlighting trends, and areas of improvement.  Integrate Unit Tests: Integrate unit tests into the automation testing framework, ensuring that:Unit tests are executed as part of the overall automated testing process Unit test results are reported alongside functional and integration tests Defects detected by unit tests are tracked and resolved accordingly Implement CICD Pipeline: Configure and maintain a Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CICD) pipeline to automate the build, test, and deployment process for our software products.  Train and Mentor Team Members: Provide training and mentorship to team members on automation testing best practices, tool usage, and process implementation.  Collaborate with Development Teams: Work closely with development teams to understand their testing needs and develop automation tests that meet those requirements.  Monitor and Improve Automation Efforts: Continuously monitor the effectiveness of our automation efforts, identify areas for improvement, and implement changes as needed.What You Need To Maximize Your Contribution  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field. 07 years of experience in QA/QC, >6 years work in QA Automation. Proven experience in building and leading high-performing QA Automation teams Expertise in designing and implementing test automation frameworks Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices Ability to define and implement QA strategies Excellent communication, presentation skills, leadership, and negotiation Experience in agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) is a plus. Good communication in EnglishPreferred Qualifications:  Software testing certification (e.g., ISTQB) is a plus. Familiarity with security testing. Knowledge of test data management practices.Salary  Negotiation Location  Kyanon - HCMC Application period  01/01 - 01/01/1970

167.job: Partime Marketing – Phát triển dự án
167.job_description: Xin chào các bạn, Hiện cty EIV đang phát triển dự án về tuyển dụng: www.vietnamteachingjobs.com Là một dự án phát triển nhắm mục tiêu trở thành website dành cho người nước ngoài tìm công việc giảng dạy tiếng anh hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Tạo điều kiện cho các sinh viên có cơ hội học hỏi và tăng cường nguồn lực phát triển trong thực tiễn công việc. Công Ty Cổ Phần Quốc Tế EIV đang mở cơ hội “phát triển tài năng trẻ” cho những ai đang muốn khám phá và phát triển mình trong ngành Marketing.  Vị trí; Thực tập sinh phòng Marketing (02 vị trí) Mô tả công việc; – Cùng các marketer công ty lên chiến lược marketing, hoạch định thời gian, mục tiêu và chi phí cho chiến dịch. – Lên các phương thức marketing tiếp cận: Giáo viên nước ngoài, trường học, trung tâm ngoại ngữ, kết nối lại với nhau và khuyến khích hướng dẫn họ sử dụng hệ thống của công ty. – Chăm sóc hệ thống website, hoàn thiện và phát triển các chức năng của website. … Yêu cầu; – Dành cho những bạn đam mê Marketing, đặc biệt dự án Online – am hiểu WordPress là cả một lợi thế lớn. – Có kinh nghiệm từng phát triển website, forum, hoặc đảm nhiệm những công việc tương tự. – Nhiệt tình, tâm huyết và yêu thích marketing. – Thành thạo: Forum, facebook, google adwords ,… – Nhanh nhẹn, vui vẻ là một cái tốt để bạn có những ý tưởng tốt cho marketing.Tham Khảo: [EIV HỒ CHÍ MINH] CHUYÊN VIÊN TUYỂN DỤNG - ĐIỀU PHỐI GIÁO VIÊN NƯỚC NGOÀI  Thời gian thực tập: – Có thể làm việc lâu dài. – Tối thiểu 1 tuần lên công ty 3 ngày. – Nếu tốt có thể được cân nhắc lên chính thức  Bạn sẽ đạt được gì khi làm việc tại EIV: – Tham gia học hỏi trong mô hình làm việc nhóm, lên ý tưởng, cũng như hiểu mô hình làm việc của một marketing. – Học hỏi được phương pháp, kế hoạch phát triển Marketing. – Học hỏi được từ các chuyên gia, kì cựu trong cty về cách làm việc. – Gặp gỡ thường xuyên với các giáo viên nước ngoài. – Tham gia các hoạt động ngoại khóa, từ thiện. – Nâng cao kỹ năng ngoại ngữ … P/S: Thực tập sẽ có lương phụ cấp. 100k/ngày làm việc. Đặc biệt thưởng cho những dự án nhỏ hoàn thành.

168.job: Risk Strategy Analyst - Financial Services, ShopeePay
168.job_description: Department OperationsLevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud. Job Description:  Credit Risk AnalysisConsume data reports and analyses to develop insights of user behaviors or potential risk trends. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Data Science, BD, Policy Strategy, Product Management, and Customer Experience teams to build fraud detection engines, improve risk system functionalities, and optimize processes & workflows. Understand the business environment and work closely with stakeholders to assess risks and build fraud protection around all product features BNPL and Cash Loan. Develop recommendations to adjust credit policies by analyzing credit and financial performance and utilizing statistical scoring, segmentation, regression and simulation techniques. Participate in developing, testing, and optimizing credit policies, ensuring consistency and regulatory compliance, and assist in the implementation of those policies, processes, and other related initiatives. Collection planning & strategyBuild collection report, included in productivity report/ collection performance by user segmentation. Build the management system information for collection: collection operation, collection performance, and collection policy tracker. Build the early warning model, to alert users of high-risk groups and take action on collection plans. Continuously refining the user segmentation, user behavior, and collection performance to control, and reduce roll rate & collection cost. Deep-dive into risk profile to identify repayment behavior, collection performance. Work closely with the bank partner team to handle, and solve problems related to collection issues in post-due. Support for bank's collection verify data collection/ repayment status of users. Propose & convince new strategy of collection for both products to parties (bank partner/ Business team/ Regional team...). Research and explore new methods and 3P data to propose their application in improving the quality of pre-due and post-due debt recovery. Other assignment tasks by line manager.  Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Banking, MIS, Accounting, or any relevant field. 1-2 years of experience in collection strategy, Consumer Finance, Banking, or similar role online lending, SME lending. Having a good civil and criminal investigations background Strong analytical and research skills. Ability to identify any suspicious activity that includes fraud threats and infringement attempts in time. Complete understanding of investigation methods and procedures. Good communication skills.

169.job_description: The role of the Beauty & Wellbeing (B&W) Vietnam (VN) R&D Leader is to act as business partner on the Country Leadership team for B&W, Vietnam and look after R&D for Hair Care and Skin Care categories.The role is part of Regional SEA R&D, and will act as key R&D contact for the business. The job holder liaise with the relevant Category R&D Design teams to ensure product technologies are identified and developed in line with business strategy and portfolio plans. Vietnam is a key strategic country for the B&W Category and the R&D Leader will play an important role to drive growth for this market as well as shape the future portfolio for local jewels.  The key job role is to be the R&D lead representative for Vietnam, partnering with the business, and leading the B&W R&D team. Specifically, key roles will include:  Country R&D Representative First point of call for any country activity that requires R&D input Responsible and accountable to deliver agreed total R&D program in the country in close partnership with Region/Global. Resources deployed on innovation agenda through agreed gatekeeping principles, allowing fast tracking of low risk/low complexity projects Work with CCBT to identify opportunities for growth of category and business in VN, and drive creation of new local projects for the pipeline Develop framework for ‘consumer perceived superiority’ that is locally relevant and develop claims packages for key innovations Own and build innovation and claims roadmaps for global & local brands working with CCBT and R&D expertise teams Delivery of all R&D elements OTIF and driving efficiency through the R&D organisation Build interfaces with R&D organisation at Regional/Global to drive ‘One R&D’ mindset and channel appropriate resources to the Country needs Represent R&D on Supply Chain Transformation and 3PM networks, to enable design of appropriate manufacturing systems in line with site master plans Drive Digital agenda for country and region Build best practice for conditioner and other post-wash market development (MDM along with marketing teams to drive category penetration and depth of consumption Be the ‘product expert’ on Hair and Skin care in the VN market, working with influencers and external KOFs to drive messages on Hair fundamentals and UL product portfolio Develop mechanisms to capture local insights/trends and use effectively in creation of comms and MTI (Maximising Technology Impact) assets for different audiences and channels Lead sustainability agenda for B&W in VN by partnering with internal and external stakeholders to develop robust model PCR implementation, recyclable sachets in a circular system Build functional and category expertise along with capabilities in the team in line with Purpose led, Future fit organization principlesThe role is based in HCM and will report to the Regional R&D Head for SEA. Current resources in the team are about 6 FTE. The main accountabilities of the BW R&D VN Leader will cover the following:  Be the voice of product in the Country LT. Help identify new trends and technology opportunities and ensure strong links with design teams Ensure OTIF delivery of R&D elements of agreed total brand innovation plan and agreed 5S saving and simplification plans; own innovation agenda together with Marketing and SC Identify opportunities for outsourcing as appropriate for capacity or capability build R&D partner for ensuring regulatory compliance, issue management, competitor challenges, relevant industry engagement and advocacy Support to Quality and Consumer complaint management where related to design Champion MTI and product activation with consumers and customers. Drive deep channel  understanding and identify relevant growth opportunities using full product portfolio  Lead and manage the R&D team (internal resources), as well as external partners or resources tapped to support the program REQUIREMENTEducation   Graduate or Advanced degree in relevant Science or Technology courses preferred;  FMCG Background and International exposure are a plus  Relevant experience:   Proven track record of driving projects and teams, and delivering with speed to a consistently high standard  Strong leadership, business acumen and influencing abilities  Broad range of R&D experiences across the organization (Global, Cluster/Local) is ideal. Strong exposure and engagement to business teams and cross-functional teams is key.  Additional :   Beauty product lover, someone who is passionate about Beauty and Wellbeing; care about sustainability  Must have very good communication and influencing skills. Must be fluent in English (reading, writing, speaking)  Must show ability to work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment  Must be open to occasional travel as needed (e.g. inter-country, international)  Digital and Data skills  Unilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. We believe a diverse workforce allows us to match our growth ambitions and drive inclusion across the business. At Unilever we are interested in every individual bringing their ‘Whole Self’ to work and this includes you! Thus if you require any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of your application so that we can support you through your recruitment journey.

170.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN UNITY SPORT
170.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 20 - 30 triệu VNĐ)  Responsibilities  Create/Modify test-related artifacts (test cases, test reports, test plans); Work closely with the development and project teams to understand project requirements and specifications; Participate in peer review and inspect requirement documents; Prepare test data and environment as needed to complete testing assignments; Perform all phases of testing including functional, system, and regression testing; Track and control testing progress, and report to team leader about any quality problems/issues of the project; Analyze and raise the issues, propose the solution to improve the system; Define, and maintain the test automation framework and ensure that appropriate testing tools are selected and applied optimally;Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Workout for FREE at the 5-star Center. Pay social insurance according to state regulations. Participate in team building every year. Friendly and fun working environment.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc: Requirements:  Specialized in IT or equivalent. 3-5 years of experience with automated testing tools, capable of building automation frameworks for API and UI. Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related fields; Having experience in test Web, App Mobile Ability to hands-on testing in multiple projects, Integration Tests, developing test cases, and test plan; Experience with Selenium or Appium based automated test framework (nice to have); Good knowledge of databases; Good knowledge of software development methodologies; Good analytic skills and mindset; Teamwork spirit; Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and work under tight deadlines.Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: CNTT - Phần Mềm,QA/Test,SQLTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

171.job_description: Nơi Làm Việc  Hồ Chí Minh (Quận 3) Cấp Bậc  Quản lý Hình Thức  Nhân viên chính thức Kinh nghiệm  5 - 8 Năm Mức Lương  Lương thỏa thuận Ngành nghề  CNTT - Phần mềm, CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng, Nông nghiệp Phòng Ban  Công nghệ thông tin Hạn Chót Nhận Hồ Sơ  31/08/2024Mô Tả Công Việc  Company Overview GREENFEED has been among agriculture leaders in Vietnam for nearly two decades. The company’s mission is to provide consumers with a clean food chain from farm to table by continuously improving its “3F plus”—feed, farm, and food—process. Today, GREENFEED manages numerous farms, animal feed facilities, and food production factories, with a distribution network across Vietnam and Southeast Asia. Position Overview As a manager of IoT and Automation, you will play a key role in the management and implementation of IoT and Automation projects. Specifically, you will be responsible for working with stakeholders to understand requirements from which to propose, design, develop, and deploy IoT systems that help to improve the productivity, reliability, effectiveness, and efficiency of the business. It’s important that you are responsible for the project spending according to the approved budget. Beside project management, you will be working with cross-functional teams to optimize operations and make continuous improvements for the company. Finally, you are expected to build, train, and develop manpower for the team, the company, as well as customers. Key responsibilities Below are key responsibilities of the job  Design IoT Solutions: tailor IoT solutions to meet specific business needs, considering factors such as data collection, network connectivity, data analysis, and data security. Deploy IoT Devices: choose appropriate IoT devices (e.g., sensors, actuators) and connect them with operational equipment and machines to gather real-time data on performance, quality, and environmental conditions. Develop IoT Platforms: collaborate with software engineers to create custom IoT applications and platforms tailored to manufacturing operations, including controls, visualization tools, and reporting mechanisms. Integrate IoT Platforms with Other Systems: integrate IoT applications with other systems such as Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) or Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) for continuous data exchange and improved production processes. Manage IoT Data: develop protocols and systems to collect and store large volumes of IoT-generated data, ensuring its integrity, security and accessibility. Analyze IoT Data: utilize data analytics tools and techniques to derive actionable insights for decision-making, enabling predictive maintenance, process optimization, and quality control. Drive Continuous Improvement: lead initiatives to enhance IoT systems and processes by gathering stakeholder feedback and monitoring industry trends and best practices. Ensure Compliance & Standards: adhere to relevant industry standards, regulations, and cybersecurity requirements throughout the design and implementation of IoT solutions. Provide Documentation & Training: create technical documentation, user manuals, and training materials to facilitate the deployment and maintenance of IoT systems, fostering knowledge transfer and skill development within the organization.Yêu Cầu Công Việc  Mandatory requirements for the job are as follows  Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related fields. Minimum 5 years of working experience in the manufacturing field, IoT and Automation. Proven experience in the design and implementation of IoT and Automation systems, sensor integration, data acquisition systems and industrial communication protocols. Proficient in implementing automation solutions with PLC, HMI, and SCADA platforms Familiar with cybersecurity principles and best practices applying to IoT systems Familiar with embedded systems and embedded systems programming Familiar with Visual Studio and C# Knowledge of IoT technologies, protocols and standards (e.g., MQTT, OPC, UA, Modbus). Knowledge of database management (both local and in the cloud) Knowledge of mobile app development Good problem-solving skills, ability to troubleshoot complex technical problems and deliver complete, effective and efficient solutions Effective communication and collaboration skills  In addition to hard requirements, it’s an advantage of having the following knowledge and experience  Cloud and edge computing platforms (e.g., AWS) Databases (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server) Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI)

172.job_description: VNG Solutions is a subsidiary of VNG Corporation, a reputable Vietnamese provider of IT services and technology on a global scale. With its key markets in the Middle East, the US, and Europe, VNG Solutions's headquarters in Vietnam is dedicated to providing enterprise-level services and empowering customers and society to advance decisively into the digital future.  VNG Solutions provides top-notch services while strictly adhering to international standards. We remain in the public eye as experts in "the next big technologies”. VNG Solutions will provide you with a creative environment with an emphasis on B2B services, where you will have the opportunity to foster your abilities and learn about various technologies to advance your career.  Responsibilities:  Innovate technical solutions and automated CI/CD pipeline. Establish and maintain Cloud, DevSecOps, and Cyber strategies for execution and growth of operations across our public sector clients. Seek ways to continuously optimize and improve all operational aspects of our cyber solutions across Cloud and DevOps (DevSecOps). Collaborate with a team of talented data scientists, engineers, and application developers to create unique solutions and capabilities. Lead DevSecOps tech challenges and proposals with team members. Assist Growth Team and Account Leads in the expansion and enhancement of a pipeline to support short- and long-range growth plans. Participate in long-range strategic planning activities designed to meet the Company's objectives and to increase its enterprise value and revenue goals. Provide architectural guidance, technical support, and advisement services to ensure identity management system technologies are integrated and meeting the appropriate security requirements. Engage with senior-level executives and provide subject matter expertise in security architecture and other key domain areas when required. Yêu cầuA minimum of ten (10) years of experience in the Information Technology field, DevSecOps, AI/ML engineering projects, and technical architecture specifically. Experience in large-scale, high-performance enterprise big data application deployment and solution architecture on complex heterogeneous environments in AWS. Familiarity with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef for maintaining and configuring servers. Expertise in containerization technologies and platforms including Docker and Kubernetes. Extensive experience with CI/CD pipeline automation and tools like Jenkins, Travis CI, Circle CI, GitLab CI/CD, or Github Actions. The ability to set up and configure monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, Nagios, or ELK stack. A strong understanding of networking concepts, including routing, firewalls, load balancing and basic knowledge of database administration and SQL. The ability to advise teams on security best practices for CI/CD pipelines. 183.job_description: Line of Service Advisory Industry/Sector Not Applicable Specialism Cybersecurity & Privacy Management Level Manager Job Description & Summary A career within Forensics Technology services, will provide you with the opportunity to help our clients protect their business in today’s evolving landscape by applying advanced and strategic approaches to information management. We focus on assisting organisations manage vast amounts of electronic data and navigate the legal and business processes demanded by critical events which includes litigation, regulatory requests and internal investigations.  Some of the things we do in Vietnam:Investigation of fraud and other corporate matters, including misappropriation, bribery and corruption, conflicts of interest, accounting fraud, and procurement fraud. Quantification of loss, including assisting clients with asset recovery. Assisting clients in developing their fraud control frameworks to prevent, detect, and investigate fraud, and to identify fraud risks in their organizations. Using forensic technology and e-reviews in most of our investigations. Carrying out anti-bribery and anti-corruption due diligence engagements and reviews. Why you should consider joining us for a while: The Vietnam Forensic team is a small but busy group split between Ho Chi Minh City (formerly Saigon) and Hanoi. The team carries out a wide range of forensic engagements, although we have a heavy weighting towards investigations for MNCs. We are dedicated to the prevention, detection, and investigation of financial crime, including fraud, market abuse, and other regulatory malpractice. We apply technology-based solutions to identify fraud risks and assist clients in closing down fraud schemes. We advise clients on ways to mitigate risk, improve corporate compliance, and enhance key business processes.  This is a management role where you will oversee the team and gain further exposure to high-profile and complex assignments across Vietnam. At any one time, you will be expected to manage multiple projects and delegate work effectively to your team. You will also get to deal with senior-level client representatives, both in Vietnam and abroad.Skills preferred:Excellent forensic investigative skills with at least 6 years of financial or non-financial investigative work – logical, analytical, articulate, confident, and professional. Enjoy working in a different culture on a variety of engagements and be comfortable taking initiative when necessary. Develop and maintain strong client relationships to ensure ongoing trust and collaboration. Ability to work well in a team environment with client staff and colleagues of all grades and backgrounds – but also not afraid to ‘roll up the sleeves’ and help out at the grassroots level. Led investigations and possess practical experience in key areas, including evidence preservation and collection, data privacy, legal privilege, investigative interviewing techniques, and business intelligence. Have a curious mindset and attention to detail, as well as a clear understanding of the commercial issues facing businesses and how to influence client conversations. Offer a flexible, accurate, and at times innovative approach. Able to prepare concise and engaging reports, delivering messages with impact. Flexibility to adapt to changing circumstances and priorities. Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Experience in conducting interviews with stakeholders, witnesses, and suspects as part of the investigative process. Able to articulate complex issues clearly in written and verbal communication appropriate to the audience. Enjoy coaching and developing team members. Act with integrity and show care for the people you work with. Accounting and legal qualifications will be a plus. Ability to mobilize to clients; premises/travel. Many forensic engagements may occur with little advance notice and are of indeterminate duration, requiring significant flexibility on behalf of our consultants. Good understanding of regulatory environment and local legislation concerning fraud and listing requirements. Knowledge and awareness of international anti-bribery and corruption regulations, including enforcement trends for the FCPA and UK Bribery Act. Key Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant certifications such as Certified Fraud Examiner (CFE), Certified Forensic Accountant (CrFA), or Certified Public Accountant (CPA) are highly desirable. Minimum 5 years and above of relevant experience in consulting/advisory work, with favourable consideration for specific experience in the areas experience in forensic advisory. Experiences in audit/internal audit or a related field being a plus. A BSc and/or MSc in Accounting or Computer Science would be advantageous. Experience in conducting investigations, analyzing financial data, and preparing reports. A proven track record of providing exceptional service and establishing and maintaining strong relationships with stakeholders. Sau này, khi bước đi trên đường đời chông gai, có thể sẽ chẳng còn ai chỉ bảo, dạy dỗ tôi tận tình như thầy đã từng, có thể sẽ chẳng có ai lo tôi liệu có ngủ đủ giấc, liệu có stress khi nhồi nhét quá nhiều. Nhưng, cố nhân từng nói, cuộc đời chỉ cần một người khiến ta ngưỡng mộ, để cả đời noi gương, cả đời thương mến. 185.job: Software Testing Practice Head, KMS Solutions
185.job_description: KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. We pride ourselves on creating brilliant solutions for our clients by leveraging deep expertise, advanced technologies, and delivery excellence for a shared success where everyone can reach their fullest potential. With three Business Lines:KMS Software: Leverage software domain expertise to help clients make better business decisions in technology platforms, increase speed-to-market, and gain critical development support through innovative technology solutions.  KMS Solutions: Empower BFSI businesses to embrace the digital finance revolution and expedite clients’ journey towards complete digitalization, technology consulting, data analytics, software development, and software quality.  KMS Healthcare: Build transformative next-gen technologies to solve healthcare’s most challenging problems, providing innovative tools and expertise to providers, payers, life sciences, and medical technology vendors.  Responsibilities  Collaborate closely with BFSI clients to understand their specific testing requirements, regulatory and compliance needs, and security considerations, establishing clear expectations and maintaining strong relationships throughout the testing lifecycle. Define and implement test strategies, methodologies, and processes tailored to the BFSI industry, ensuring comprehensive test coverage and alignment with regulatory requirements. Oversee the execution of test plans specific to the BFSI industry, monitor progress, analyze test results, and provide recommendations for improvements and issue resolution. Stay updated with the latest trends, technologies, and regulatory changes within the BFSI industry, identifying opportunities for process improvements and driving the implementation of best practices. Prepare and present comprehensive reports on testing activities, progress, and results. Develop and execute the overall testing strategy for KMS enterprise testing service  Qualifications  BS degree in Computer Science or a related field Proven experience of at least 10 years in a leadership role within the software testing domain, specifically in the BFSI industry. Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies, tools, and best practices Experience in managing and leading teams of testing professionals, fostering a collaborative and results-oriented environment. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and collaborate with BFSI clients, stakeholders, and team members at all levels Solid experience in Test Automation Tools and Frameworks, familiarity with agile methodologies  Benefits and Perks  Thinking of joining KMS Solutions? Yes, you deserve it!  Progressive Career Development  Role-based training foundation Active role at the global client-side Continuous professional certification Simple goals - achievable successAttractive compensation  Up to 15 months salary/year Performance review twice a year Premium healthcare insurance 18+ paid leave/yearEngagement workplace  Flexi mode, modern work environment Well-being centricImpactful community organization  Community development activities: 1% Pledge, KMS Gives charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,…

186.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 27 - 45 triệu VNĐ) Your role & responsibilities  Design, build, and maintain efficient and reliable real-time data pipelines to support live sports scoring and analytics. Develop architectures and databases optimized for fast querying and real-time data processing on physical servers. Work with sports data feeds and APIs to capture, store, and normalize data for real-time usage. Collaborate with the frontend and analytics teams to implement features that rely on real-time data processing. Ensure system consistency and data integrity with high availability and performance. Monitor system performance, implement necessary adjustments, and respond to system-wide issues in a timely manner. Manage data storage solutions on physical infrastructure, focusing on security and data recovery. Utilize modern data processing technologies like Kafka and Spark, suited to streaming and real-time analytics. Document system architecture and maintain data flow diagrams for internal use. Develop strategies for integrating multiple data sources and APIs, ensuring smooth data flow and consistency across different platforms. Implement data crawling techniques to enhance the collection processes from various data sources and improve the breadth of data available for analytics. Conduct research to identify new data sources and evaluate their potential integration into the system to improve product offerings.  Your skills & qualifications  Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, with a strong background in real-time data systems. Proficiency in Python, Java, or similar programming languages. Experience with real-time data processing tools (Kafka, Spark Streaming, etc.). Familiarity with sports data APIs and their integration into live systems. Strong understanding of SQL and NoSQL databases, such as PostgreSQL and Cassandra. Knowledge of managing physical servers and optimizing server performance. Proven ability to troubleshoot and optimize data pipelines and architectures for real-time operations. Excellent project management skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Experience in data mapping and normalization across various data sources and APIs. Skilled in designing and implementing data crawlers to automate data collection and enhance real-time data availability.  Benefits for you Workout for FREE at the 5-star Center. Pay social insurance according to state regulations. Participate in team building every year. Friendly and fun working environment. Participate in team building every year. Friendly and fun working environment. Combined, they offer the chance to learn from the best across our different countries. 190.job_description: Sr. Business Designer  MAIN JOB PURPOSE:  Venture building has been described as the next frontier to drive corporate innovation. The DFS Asia team functions like a fast-growing startup within Bayer in order to rapidly develop new business models with the goal of capturing new customers and market segments. We are on a mission to accelerate the digital farming ecosystem across Asia to empower small holder farmers. In order to achieve this vision, we need to put small holder farmers at the centre of our product development and venture building process.  We are currently strengthening the Business Design team to spearhead the human-centred-design approach within DFS Bayer Crop Science, Asia. We are looking for design champions who are passionate about solving some of the biggest problem in the agriculture industry. The Senior Business designer will help our team design value proposition for our digital products and putting small holder farmers and other agriculture stakeholders at the core of what we are building. The role will be based in Vietnam.This is a rare opportunity to work for one of the top Fortune 500 companies while enjoying the experience of a startup environment.  YOUR TASKS & RESPONSIBILITIES:Working with colleagues across Asia to support their Business Design needs Facilitate design sprints and workshops with heterogeneous groups of clients and stakeholders Support our Venture Leads when it comes to organizing virtual design sprints with wider APAC colleagues or running workshops with local colleagues and small holder farmers. Recommend Business Design best practice and the right design methodologies. To contextualize the demand and help define the need of small holder farmers. This will help to inform our digital product development process. To personalize the design approach and elaborate tailor-made specifications to support our ventures located in different countries To facilitate the internal Bayer communication to decompartmentalize the services or stakeholders involved in the realization of the project Manage user research and Business Design process, drive decisions, track issues, and assist in estimating resource, needs and schedules. Collaborate with product owners and leaders to drive product strategy and the development roadmap. Plan and manage the design research activities (research strategy, ethnographic based user research, secondary research, UX research…) collaboratively with the team. Plan and execute system mapping, customer journeys, scenarios and service specifications. Analyze research data identifying and generating meaningful insights and behavioral patterns. Training Junior Business designers and help our Product Design team to understand Business Design principles WHO YOU ARE:5+ years of relevant experience Experience in working on a broad range of research and innovation-oriented projects Excellent presentation and communication skills, both written and verbal. (fluency in English and Vietnamese is a must) Experience with high-level stakeholders’ engagement. Strong interpersonal and client management skills. Experience with mentoring and elevating other creative people into Business Design thinking. Experience in conducting and synthesizing research, insights and findings. Experience in structuring and visualizing journey maps, service ideation, concept communication and specification. A hands-on Senior Business designer with skills in visual / interaction design as well. Excellent portfolio showcasing design solutions and strategic approaches. Ability to facilitate workshops, set design sprints and hold seminars and training sessions. Knowledge of agile approaches and techniques. Ability to communicate effectively with different audiences. A solid competency in storytelling and public speaking. You are comfortable explaining your ideas to client stakeholders and to ideate the best means to present your conceptual work. Attention to details and organizational approach. Ability to understand the impact of technology on design deliverables.Application Period:  Please define Reference Code:  822160 Division:  Crop Science Location:  Vietnam : Ho Chi Minh City : Ho Chi Minh City || Vietnam : Hoan Kiem and Ba Dinh : Hanoi || Vietnam : Southeast : Binh Duong || Vietnam : Đồng Nai : Bien Hoa City (Amata) Functional Area:  Marketing Position Grade:  VS 1.1 Employment Type:  Regular Work Time:  Please define Contact Us AddressTelephoneE-Mail 1831 Diegem HROP_Belgium@bayer.com

191.job_description: City: Ho Chi MinhJob Function: TechJob Area: Product & ITSeniority Level: Mid-Senior levelDate: Aug 13, 2024  HRS AS A COMPANYHRS, the pioneer in business travel, aims to elevate every stay through innovative technology. Withover 50 years of experience, our digital platform, driven by ProcureTech, TravelTech, and FinTech,reinvents how companies and travelers Stay, Work, and Pay - cohesively brought together by ourLodging as a Service solution. ProcureTech digitally revolutionizes lodging procurement, connecting corporations and suppliers in acutting-edge ecosystem. TravelTech redefines the online lodging experience, offering personalized content from selection tocheck-in, ensuring an unparalleled journey for corporate travelers. In FinTech, HRS introduces advancements like mobile banking and digital payments, turningcorporate back offices into touchless lodging enablers, eliminating legacy cost barriers. Combining these technology propositions, HRS unlocks exponential catalyst effects. Our data-drivenfocus delivers value-added services and high-return network effects, creating substantial customervalue. Beyond cost savings in the global post-pandemic economy, HRS clients gain from anunrivaled focus on essential aspects including safety, security and satisfaction. HRS's exponentialgrowth since 1972 serves over 35% of the global Fortune 500 and leading hotel chains.BUSINESS UNITThe HRS PAY business unit is hyper-focused on driving not only the HRS “flywheel” via the powerfulcombination of STAY and PAY, but also our own PAY flywheel whereby both corporate clients andthird-party partners benefit from leveraging HRS PAY’s technology and capabilities. The morecorporate clients use PAY, the more third-party partners such as banks, card issuers, ERPs, bookingplatforms and other financial service providers want to partner and collaborate with us, and thisdrives further commercial growth for PAY by monetizing those partnership streams. HRS PAY is a“tech fin” in that we provide the technology that powers the payment workflow as well as deliversthe highest level of available payment data to enable our customers to make intelligent decisionsaround their program spending. Only HRS PAY offers this powerful combination of automation, dataoptimization, and payment on-the-go technology all in one platform.POSITIONWe are looking for an excellent (Senior) Machine Learning Engineer, who will be responsible for building and maintaining the next generation of our ML Product. You will have the power to lead your initiatives geared toward making the ML Engineers and Applied Scientists at HRS Fintech more productive.CHALLENGE Work with a wide range of systems, processes, and technologies to own and solve problems from end-to-end. Assist in building back-end infrastructure, data pipelines, and ML models for our products. Experiment with ML techniques to create and test new program features. Assist in extending and improving existing ML models. Work alongside data engineers to create data and model pipelines and embed AI and analytics into the business decision processes. Integrate ML models to end-users and run experiments. Run tests, perform statistical analysis, interpret test results, and perform tuning and scaling.FOR THIS EXCITING MISSION YOU ARE EQUIPPED WITH... Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, mathematics, or a related field. Experience with DevOps, MLOps, or LLMOps tools and methodologies, such as Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Airflow, Kubeflow, etc. Proficiency in Python, SQL. Solid understanding of fundamental statistics, probability theory, and the scientific method. Experience in deploying machine learning models to production environments, including containerization (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubeflow, MLflow), for batch and real-time inference. Strong software engineering principles, including modular code design, code optimization, and familiarity with software development best practices. Practical working experience with Azure cloud technologies (Azure AI) is a plus. Experience with MLOps to build production-ready pipelines. Strong English verbal and written communication skills, with a high level of comfort explaining complex technical topics to stakeholders.PERSPECTIVEAccess to a global network of a globally united and mutually responsible “Tribe of Intrapreneurs” that is passionately dedicated to renew the travel industry and while doing so reinvent the ways how businesses stay, work and pay.  Our entrepreneurial driven environment of full ownership and execution focus offers you the playground to contribute to a greater mission, while growing personally and professionally throughout this unique journey. You will continuously learn from a radical culture of retrospectives and continuous improvement and actively contribute to making business life better, smarter and more sustainable.LOCATION, MOBILITY, INCENTIVEThe attractive remuneration is in line with the market and, in addition to a fixed monthly salary, all necessary work equipment and mobility, will also include an annual or multi-year bonus.Req ID: 17630Job Segment: Testing, Cloud, Travel Industry, Computer Science, Technology, Travel
